languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioners{/g} are specialists in inflicting enduring and excruciating pain on all enemies around them, exploiting it to quickly eradicate their adversaries.
Core focus: {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effects, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} damage, {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}, crowd control, large number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Executioners are specialist in inflicting long-lasting pain to all enemies around, and exploiting it to quickly kill all adversaries.
Core focus: Damage over Time effects, Melee DD, Debuffs, Crowd Control, High Wounds

languages.text:
Los {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutores{/g} son especialistas en causar un dolor insufrible y constante a los enemigos que les rodean, y aprovechan su vulnerabilidad para erradicarlos.
Especialidades: efectos de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} continuado, daño {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efectos negativos{/g}, control de masas, gran cantidad de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}は周囲にいるすべての敵に永続的で耐え難い苦痛を与え、それを利用して敵を素早く根絶やしにするスペシャリストだ。
コアフォーカス：継続{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}ダメージ、{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}、群衆制御、多数の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}。
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioners{/g} are specialists in inflicting enduring and excruciating pain on all enemies around them, exploiting it to quickly eradicate their adversaries.
Core focus: {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effects, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} damage, {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}, crowd control, large number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}は周囲にいるすべての敵に永続的で耐え難い苦痛を与え、それを利用して敵を素早く根絶やしにするスペシャリストだ。
コアフォーカス：継続{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}ダメージ、{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}、群衆制御、多数の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}是施加痛苦的专家，可以造成高额持续伤害，并利用持续伤害效果迅速消灭敌人。
核心：持续{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}效果、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}伤害、{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}、控制效果、大量{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioners{/g} are specialists in inflicting enduring and excruciating pain on all enemies around them, exploiting it to quickly eradicate their adversaries.
Core focus: {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effects, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} damage, {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}, crowd control, large number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}是施加痛苦的专家，可以造成高额持续伤害，并{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}{/g}利用持续伤害效果迅速消灭敌人。
核心：持续{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}效果、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}伤害、{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}、控制效果、大量{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g} sind darauf spezialisiert, allen Gegnern in ihrer Umgebung anhaltende und unerträgliche Schmerzen zuzufügen. Dies nutzen sie aus, um ihre Gegner rasch zu vernichten.
Kernfokus: {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}-über-Zeit-Effekte, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfschaden{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative Effekte{/g}, Mengenkontrolle, hohe Zahl von {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}.

Kernfokus: {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}-über-Zeit-Effekte, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g}schaden, {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative Effekte{/g}, Mengenkontrolle, hohe Zahl von {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}

languages.text:
Les {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteurs{/g} infligent d'atroces souffrances aux ennemis qui les entourent et exploitent ces vulnérabilités pour les éradiquer aussi vite que possible.
Points forts : effets de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} progressifs, dégâts de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effets négatifs{/g}, contrôle de foule, grand nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Les {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteurs{/g} infligent d'atroces souffrances aux ennemis qui les entourent et exploitent ces {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnérabilités{/g} pour les éradiquer aussi vite que possible.
Points forts : effets de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} progressifs, dégâts de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effets négatifs{/g}, contrôle de foule, grand nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Палачи{/g} – настоящие мастера в причинении нестерпимой продолжительной боли любым оказавшимся рядом противникам. Их методы уничтожения врага весьма эффективны.
Ключевые особенности: периодический {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, урон в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативные эффекты{/g}, контроль, большое количество {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Cellat{/g}, kalıcı ve katlanılmaz acılar çektirme konusunda uzmandır ve bu yeteneğini de düşmanlarını çabucak ortadan kaldırmak için kullanır.
Güçlü yönleri: Zamanla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} veren etkiler, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} hasarı, {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}olumsuz etkiler{/g}, kitle kontrolü, yüksek miktarda {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g}.
